Title: Five Stars
Content: Such a clean sound off these bad boys!

Title: Nice one Presonus ^.^
Content: Arrived as new, these monitors are the best value for money as well as quality. I like everything about them, control, look, and sound quality. I'm having to put up with aux inputs for the time being until i get some new cables, so there is some humming floating around but with proper input cables they are so good. Everything i expect of Presonus, they are a great brand.

Title: At this price, an absolute steal!
Content: Great speakers. Nice bass, mid and treble. My first monitor speakers, and very, very pleased. Hooked up to my PC, and I can no listen to all my tunes without any distortion. Got some audio foam for the base, just to limit any rattling, none at all. Brilliant, and at the price they are now, ¬£116, an absolute steal. Even at top price, people were saying these speakers give great value for money. Just over ¬£50 for each speaker is the bargain of the year!

Title: Awesome monitors, everything I wanted in a pair of miniature powered speakers
Content:
These monitors are a revelation!

Everything I wanted in a miniature monitor is basically provided: sounds pop out of the speakers in a three-dimensional way, there is crisp and clean treble, clear and realistic mid-range, and a very reasonable amount of bass for the size. Stereo imaging is good, and I have not found them at all fatiguing to listen to.

Content: These are amazing speakers for studio recording! :D

Title: Four Stars
Content: Excellent bass from such a small speaker package.

Title: Great budget monitors but check voltage selector before plugging in!
Content: Excellent buy. Go great with my Presonus studio 1 and firebox. I had been mixing via headphones and hi fi speakers. The monitors make a world of difference. One caveat the manual says that voltage selector on the speakers will be set to that of the country where purchased mine wasn't and needed changing - make sure you check it to avoid a blown fuse - or worse!. Also came with the wrong power lead. Although annoying, for the price, these are still worth five stars.

Title: Five Stars
Content: great sound from a compact low price monitor. recommended.

Title: Fantastic, clear sound in a very compact package
Content:
Fantastic, clear sound in a very compact package. That being said, I do get a tiny bit of (mains?) hum from them, and (as other reviewers have noticed) they're not 100% screened against external interference - they will occasionally pickup my mobile, possibly over the speaker cable link to the passive speaker.
But the sound is excellent, great bass for a set this size, and the build quality is rock solid.

Title: Five Stars
Content: Great speakers for the money with slick design.
